mainTitle: My approach is not templates, but solutions tailored to specific business goals

items.title: Custom Solutions
items.description: I don’t use templates. Each website is a unique solution created for specific business goals, target audience, and product. I thoroughly analyze the task to ensure the result works for you and your brand.

items.title: Strong Visual Style
items.description: Thanks to my background in video production, I can create visual solutions that grab attention and enhance your image. My websites look modern, professional, and build trust from the first glance.

items.title: Modern UX
items.description: Users shouldn’t have to figure out how to use your site. I design a logical, intuitive structure that guides them to the desired action: contact, purchase, or request. Your website will be user-friendly, even for first-time visitors.

items.title: SEO and Analytics
items.description: I lay the foundation for results — visually and technically. Framevix websites are optimized for search engines, load fast, and are analytics-ready. You get more than a beautiful storefront — a full-fledged sales tool.
